citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 am on
16-Nov-17.
Inspector attempted to contact licensee by phone. Left message on house phone. Unable to reach the licensee on
cell phone number provided. Inspector was able to talk to a family member who stated licensee was not available.
Left business card on the gate.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 am on
16-Nov-17.
Inspector attempted to contact licensee by phone.  Left message on house phone.  Unable to reach the licensee on
cell phone number provided.  Inspector was able to talk to a family member who stated licensee was not available. 
Left business card on the gate.
